= Parts Registry DAS  =

= How to use the Parts Registry DAS through the Biological Web Services Proxy =

To use iHOP through the proxy the following parameters should be added to the proxy URL:

*bwsp_service* = PartsRegistry_DAS

Name of the service

*bwsp_response_format* = row | json

Response format, could be the row xml format provided by the iHOP web service or JSON. 

*bwsp_callback* = callback name

If provided the response of the server is a JSONP function 

*bwsp_cache* = 0 | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5

Cache time

 * 0) no cache
 * 1) 1 hour
 * 2) 1 day
 * 3) 1 week
 * 4) 1 month
 * 5) 1 year

*bwsp_rest* = Parts Registry DAS url

Parts Registry DAS url. See the following examples

= Examples =

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/dsn

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/protein_annotations/entry_points

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/protein_annotations/types

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/protein_annotations/features?selection=UniprotNumber

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/protein_annotations/dna?selection=PartName:firstbase,lastbase

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/parts/entry_points

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/parts/features?segment=PartName

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/parts/dna?segment=PartName

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/parts/features?segment=PartName:firstbase,lastbase

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_cache=4&bwsp_rest=http://partsregistry.org/das/parts/dna?segment=PartName:firstbase,lastbase
